# Dvergr Pick Master
## Overview
You have learned to throw war picks with impressive accuracy.

## Effects
You gain the following benefits:

- You treat war picks as though they have the thrown (range 20/60) property. If your war pick is an [[Aerodynamic Picks|aerodynamic pick]] (see [[Dvergr Equipment]]), you increase their normal and maximum range by +10 ft.
- You treat war picks as though they have the versatile (1d10) property.
